ing: 1 (20 ounce) package Green GiantÂ® Garlic & Herb Mashed Cauliflower
1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
des: "There's no sacrificing flavor with this delicious diet swap. Our Mashed Cauliflower is a great alternative to mashed potatoes, and it still tastes rich and creamy. Spinach, mozzarella and Parmesan pair perfectly with the garlic and herb flavor."
ins:
Cook Green GiantÂ® Garlic & Herb Mashed Cauliflower according to package directions.
Heat olive oil in large nonstick skillet over medium heat and cook spinach 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until wilted.
Combine Green GiantÂ® Garlic & Herb Mashed Cauliflower, spinach, mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.
